mapper.select: SELECT A.title, A.expired_at AS expiredAt, A.discountper AS discountPer, A.distribute_at AS distributeAt FROM coupon A INNER JOIN receive_coupon B ON A.coupon_id = B.coupon_id WHERE B.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT C.title, C.expired_at AS expiredAt, C.discountper AS discountPer, C.distribute_at AS distributeAt FROM used_coupon A INNER JOIN receive_coupon B ON A.receive_id = B.receive_id INNER JOIN coupon C ON B.coupon_id = C.coupon_id WHERE B.user_id = #{userId}
